markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deathless](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1238)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 330 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These symbols fortify your body's grasp on your soul, keeping it tethered when death approaches.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You gain the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) or [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition;  **Effect** You reduce the value of the triggering condition by 1.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Deathless
